title: Installing Node.js and NPM on Ubuntu/Debian
description:
This is just short snippet on how to install Node.js (any version) and NPM (Node Package Manager) on your Ubuntu/Debian system.
Step 1 - Update your system sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install git-core curl build-essential openssl libssl-dev python Step 2 - Install Node.js First, clone the Node.js repository:
git clone https://github.com/nodejs/node.git cd node Now, if you require a specific version of Node:
git tag # Gives you a list of released versions git checkout v13.
